name: Card Collector And Card Girls
description:
Control: Keyboard arrow keys, A button = Z, B button = X

Battle is turn-based, Use your skills appropriately.
This game has no story. You just have to defeat enemies
and acquire skill cards to learn skills or acquire items to challenge stronger enemies.
You must level up to fight stronger enemies, and you can learn skills by collecting card items
that are dropped by enemies with a certain probability.
There is no game over even if you lose.
The game is intuitive.
The Bosses in this game is powerful. Please prepare well before taking on the challenge.
The genre and combat method of this game is JRPG-style,
but it is a game focused on combat and skill card collection without a story.
Please have fun.
